section.heading: Maintenance of documents.
section.text: Copies of the specimen bonds and of the final Financing Documents and Closing Documents shall be filed in the Office of the Secretary of the District of Columbia.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 112 of New Convention Center Hotel Omnibus Financing and Development Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-404, June 26, 2006, 53 DCR 5404).
